text: Like Dr. King's dream, our hearts gather loved ones near and far.
The warmth of MLK Day embraces both present and absent hearts.
MLK Day blessings connect us to those we hold dear, wherever they may be.
Like Dr. King's vision, love guides us to those we miss.
The MLK Day gathering welcomes both present guests and absent friends.
Like Dr. King's message, our hearts reach for those who can't be here.
MLK Day joy multiplies when shared with those we love and miss.
Like Dr. King's dream, love reaches both near and far.
The MLK Day spirit connects hearts across any distance.
Like Dr. King's legacy, love reaches those we can't embrace.
MLK Day memories bridge the gap between present and absent loved ones.
Like Dr. King's words, love carries thoughts to those far away.
The MLK Day celebration nourishes both body and soul, near and far.
Like Dr. King's spirit, love watches over those we miss.
MLK Day peace embraces both present company and absent friends.
Like Dr. King's dream, love brings light to absent hearts.
The MLK Day spirit unites hearts across any distance.
Like Dr. King's vision, love connects us to those far away.
MLK Day joy is complete when shared with all we love.
Like Dr. King's legacy, love brings together all we hold dear.
